maintext.text:
Commander,
the crew is ready for the mission briefing.

Shall I open a channel and establish a connection?

rightButton.rbText:
Not yet,
I will take care of the briefing later.

maintext.text:
Commander,
I don't have to remind you that time is of the essence.

The mission does not allow for further delays.

leftButton.lbText:
Yes, I understand that.
I guess we'll do the briefing right now.

rightButton.rbText:
You're putting quite a bit of pressure on me here.
But if it needs to be now...

maintext.text:
Commander,
Professor Jurij Orlow speaking.
We are ready for our mission briefing.

Hello Commander,
Robin here. I've already begun to prepare everything for a second expedition.

leftButton.lbText:
Hello Professor.
Please begin.
What should we look out for on this mission?

rightButton.rbText:
Hello Robin.
Sounds very good.
How should the mission proceed?

maintext.text:
I would like to emphasize again that I don't have a good feeling about another expedition.

I believe it to carry incalculable risks. You're putting us in unnecessary danger!

leftButton.lbText:
Your concerns are justified.
But we have to do it.
Without the samples we don't have enough data do successfully complete the mission.

rightButton.rbText:
Objection noted, Professor.
Robin, what is your opinion?

maintext.text:
Okay, this is the situation:
The diving shuttle is ready to go.
Fuel tanks are at full capacity and all systems have been personally inspected by me. We should have no trouble finding new samples at the dig site with our navigational data.

leftButton.lbText:
Sounds like a good plan.
Everything should run smoothly.

rightButton.rbText:
Professor,
do you have anything to add?

maintext.text: Commander, the mission will only go as planned if we follow the predetermined route precisely and...

Well, that much is obvious.
Now don't be so overcautious, Professor!

leftButton.lbText:
Robin, let him finish.

Carry on, Professor.

rightButton.rbText:
Professor,
Robin carefully planned the mission.
Don't be so pessimistic.

maintext.text:
Every deviation from our plan could endanger the mission and our lives.
On our last expedition we almost lost the diving shuttle.

It wasn't my fault that the main rudder malfunctioned!
And we still don't know exactly what the cause was.

leftButton.lbText:
Robin,
you will give the shuttle another thorough check-up before the mission.
There can be no further incidents.

rightButton.rbText:
Don't worry Professor.
There won't be any problems this time.
It's gonna be fine.

maintext.text:
I thoroughly disagree with that.
But you are the Commander...

Exactly, Professor.
HE is the Commander and HE gives the orders!

leftButton.lbText:
That's what I wanted to hear, Robin.
Now let's go!

rightButton.rbText:
No more discussions, Professor.
Get to work!

maintext.text:
Understood, Commander.

The only thing that remains, is deciding on who will carry out the fieldwork this time.
Should I pilot the shuttle again, or do you want the Professor to go on the mission this time?

Your decision.

leftButton.lbText:
Robin, 
you'll take the shuttle to the excavation site.

rightButton.rbText:
Professor Orlow,
you will go to the excavation site with the shuttle.

maintext.text:
Oh, no no no.
You can't expect that of me.
I am not trained for that.

Then allow me to go.
I carried out the first mission and know my way around the terrain out there.

leftButton.lbText:
Alright, Robin.
You've convinced me.
You can carry out the mission.

maintext.text:
Court-martial me for all I care, or report me to mission control.

I'm not going out there.

leftButton.lbText:
This will have consequences, Professor.

Robin, you will have to take over.

rightButton.rbText:
Okay okay,
no one is getting court-martialed here.
Robin, you'll carry out the mission.

maintext.text:
Affirmative.
Then I'll get myself ready and contact you as soon as I'm on my way to the diving shuttle.

Over and Out.
Over and Out, Commander.

leftButton.lbText:
See you later,
Robin.

Over and Out.

rightButton.rbText:
Okay, but hurry up.
We've already lost too much time with discussions.

maintext.text:
Commander,
I have followed and evaluated the mission briefing.

Your decisions were...
â€¦
...
interesting.

rightButton.rbText: If I wanted to know your opinion, I'd have asked you!

maintext.text:
No need to thank me, Commander.
I am only an intelligent machine.
My programming requires an evaluation of the situation and all involved parties.

leftButton.lbText:
Yes, I know.
Just let me know as soon as Dr. Muller is ready to begin the expedition.

rightButton.rbText:
Whatever.
Just give me some space. I need to think about a few things.

maintext.text:
My apologies, Commander.

I did not mean to...
...
...
hurt your feelings.

leftButton.lbText:
Uhm, what?

Just let me know as soon as Dr. Muller is ready to begin the expedition.

rightButton.rbText:
Don't worry.
I'm fine.

Just give me some space. I need to think about a few things.

maintext.text:
I will do that, Commander.

Until later.
***offline***

Commander,

Dr. Muller is still busy with preparations and has not yet arrived at the shuttle dock.

I will contact you, as soon as she is ready.
